extendedInfo.description: Use this test on a weekly basis to track your history of depression. It also might be used to show your doctor how your symptoms have changed from one visit to the next. Changes of five or more points are significant.This is best used over time to see trends and changes in your depressive moods.This application is not designed to make a diagnosis of depression or take the place of a professional diagnosis. If you suspect that you are depressed, please consult with a mental health professional as soon as possible.This is a casual way to track your depression, it is meant to be used with traditional therapies, not to replace them.This application is rated Mature not for content but because this inventory is meant for adults tracking their own progress.Please email the developer if your display is different than the provided screenshots.  Mention any themes or custom UI you may be running.

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Useful App that allows you to place a slightly objective measurement on how you are feeling.  The only thing which prevents me from giving it 5 stars is that you cannot delete an earlier result.  This means that my 13 YO hacking into my phone and experimenting with how \"he feels\" has meant that my results have been forever compromised.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Neat app with simple direct questions,  though needs to scale for higher res screens
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No problems with contrast. Maybe prblem has been corrected.
reviews.comment: Most comments are old. The app works fine. It is a great tool for those suffering with any mood disorder that involves depression.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is great
reviews.comment: Each question is worth a \"score\" of 0 to 5. So the higher the resulting number, the more severe your depression symptoms. It was great to see my score drop when I started my antidepressant. I don\'t really feel too much different, but my score dropped by 25 points, which is huge!
reviews.author: Kristen Strickland

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I see no problems
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dark buttons with dark font, useless app when reading is necessary. UnInstalled 1 star....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can read it fine. I do the inventory whenever my mood shifts. Has been helpful in collecting data. Questions are direct, prying, and well phrased.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but...
reviews.comment: You can\'t look at your answers after you\'ve taken the test. Because it would be great if I could show my answers to my therapist.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very interesting app
reviews.comment: Helped me to decide whether or not to see a shrink. If you\'re honest with yourself, it will help you identify triggers for depression and such.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Should make one for mania.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Color choices of text and background make this difficult if not impossible to use. You can\'t read it to answer the questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too subjective
reviews.comment: Next to useless for tracking moods or depression.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only thing I\'d add is a spot to make little notes next to each entry date. Ex(school starts)or(breakup w/jill) so when you look back you can remember.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not much help but it works as it tells you what you probably already knew & its a quiz/test it tells you in the description!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good app for people who are depressed lykk me .
